entries.journal_entry_completion_summary: It took some doing but Bastra's slicer was able to shift through the data and locate the item that both the Rebels and Empire have been searching for. Its a droid that was sold to a merchant named Watto, who lives in Mos Espa. Bastra is sending you up to Watto to retrieve this droid.
entries.journal_entry_description: Captain Bastra has given you a chance to prove yourself. The cargo was broken up into three lots. One lot was acquired by some Jawa traders in a Sand Crawler. The second sold to the Valarian crime ring, and the last sold to the Darklighter clan. You have succeeded in getting Bastra a complete inventory of all three lots. Now Bastra wants you to go and give her slicer the data. Only problem is he is currently working for some very bad people who want his undivided attention.
entries.task00_comm_message_text: Good job on getting the complete inventory. You need it get it to my slicer. But he is freelancing for some criminals. You need get to him, using any means necessary.
entries.task01_journal_entry_description: Bastra's slicer needs some rescuing from his current employers, a group of gun runners near the Darklighter Estate..
entries.task02_comm_message_text: Got the data from Lavar. Looks like I had the wrong impression about you. Most of my people are in hiding from the Imps. You have to get to this Watto character and retrieve the droid for me.
